meanings.definition: To surpass in cleverness or cunning.
meanings.sent1: She outtricks her friends in solving puzzles.
meanings.sent2: He always outtricks his opponents in chess.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox outtricks the hunter by hiding in the bushes.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking outtricks any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: Outtricking others requires a sharp mind and quick reflexes.

meanings.sent1: The detective outtricks the criminal in solving the case.
meanings.sent2: She outtricks her siblings in playing pranks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat outtricks the dog by sneaking through the back door.
meanings.sent4: His clever plan outtricks any attempts to stop him.
meanings.sent5: Outtricking someone means staying one step ahead at all times.

meanings.sent1: The magician outtricks the audience with his illusions.
meanings.sent2: She outtricks her opponents in the debate with persuasive arguments.
meanings.sent3: The tricky raccoon outtricks the campers by stealing their snacks.
meanings.sent4: His cunning strategy outtricks the enemy's defenses.
meanings.sent5: Outtricking others can sometimes lead to unexpected consequences.
